featured.title: Trail Making Test Digital
featured.shortDescription: Digital neuropsychological assessment tool for iPad and tablets.
featured.fullDescription: Digital neuropsychological assessment tool for iPad and tablets. Features Part A (number sequencing) and Part B (alternating number-letter sequences) to evaluate visual attention and task switching abilities.
featured.challenges: Implementing precise touch interactions and timing for neuropsychological accuracy
featured.learnings: Understanding the intersection of technology and healthcare, mobile app optimization

featured.title: Aula Firebase Next.js
featured.shortDescription: Learning management system with Firebase integration and real-time features.
featured.fullDescription: Learning management system with Firebase integration and real-time features. Features user authentication, Firestore document management, Cloud Storage for image uploads, and real-time data synchronization.
featured.challenges: Implementing real-time data sync and managing complex Firebase security rules
featured.learnings: Advanced Firebase techniques, real-time application architecture

all.title: Trail Making Test Digital
all.shortDescription: Digital neuropsychological assessment tool for iPad and tablets.
all.fullDescription: Digital neuropsychological assessment tool for iPad and tablets. Features Part A (number sequencing) and Part B (alternating number-letter sequences) to evaluate visual attention and task switching abilities.

all.title: Aula Firebase Next.js
all.shortDescription: Learning management system with Firebase integration and real-time features.
all.fullDescription: Learning management system with Firebase integration and real-time features. Features user authentication, Firestore document management, Cloud Storage for image uploads, and real-time data synchronization.
all.challenges: Implementing real-time data sync and managing complex Firebase security rules

all.title: Meu Assessor Fashion
all.shortDescription: AI-powered fashion consultant with intelligent styling recommendations.
all.fullDescription: AI-powered fashion consultant with intelligent styling recommendations. This project challenged me to work with AI/ML integration and create a system that understands user preferences to provide personalized fashion advice.
all.challenges: Training AI models for fashion recommendations and handling subjective style preferences
all.learnings: AI/ML integration, Python Flask development, fashion industry insights

all.title: Python Code Automation
all.shortDescription: Powerful automation toolkit for streamlining development workflows.
all.fullDescription: Powerful automation toolkit for streamlining development workflows. Built to solve repetitive tasks and includes workflow automation, API integrations, and script management capabilities.
all.challenges: Creating flexible automation scripts that work across different environments
all.learnings: Python automation best practices, API integration patterns

all.title: Hydrogen Mush
all.shortDescription: Modern e-commerce platform built with Shopify Hydrogen.
all.fullDescription: Modern e-commerce platform built with Shopify Hydrogen featuring server-side rendering, lightning-fast performance, and a beautiful modern UI. This project showcases the power of Hydrogen for e-commerce.
all.challenges: Optimizing performance with Hydrogen and creating seamless user experience
all.learnings: Advanced Hydrogen techniques, e-commerce optimization, performance tuning

all.title: Mush Shopify Store
all.shortDescription: Comprehensive Shopify store with custom themes and features.
all.fullDescription: Comprehensive Shopify store with custom themes and features. Built with Shopify, Liquid, and JavaScript to create a complete e-commerce solution that helps businesses grow.
all.challenges: Creating custom Shopify themes that balance functionality with performance
all.learnings: Advanced Shopify development, Liquid templating, e-commerce best practices
